document.title: 2013 Annual Report
document.abstract: This annual report highlights the mission and goals of MTAS and how it worked towards those goals in 2013. Projects discussed include the Clarksville Parks and Recreation Department's "Good to Great" initiative; assessment centers conducted in McKenzie, Signal Mountain, and Goodlettsville; and improved parking in Knoxville's central business district.

field.name: comments
field.value:
The MTAS publications provided on Trace are archival documents intended for informational purposes only and should not be considered as authoritative. The content contained in these publications may be outdated, and the laws referenced therein may have changed or may not be applicable to your city or circumstances.

For current information, please visit: http://www.mtas.tennessee.edu.
